properties.areaDesc: Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 8:44AM EST until February 20 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 5 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach
FL out 20 NM and Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina
Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST THURSDAY
